We want to know what you're up to! * Did you write a cool blog post or make a YouTube video about digital marketing or web development using Xperience by Kentico? * Did you express an interesting thought about AI, martech, or digital experience (DX) on LinkedIn? * Have you authored an amazing open-source library for Xperience by Kentico projects? Fill out this form to let us know about your contribution to the Kentico community and we'll try to amplify your voice to our audience. *** All published contributions below appear after a 2 week delay. Want to see the latest ones from the Kentico community? Be sure to sign up for **[the Kentico Community Newsletter](https://community.kentico.com/cmsctx/pm/dfbb939f-efca-409d-9ddc-613047fadcca/lang/en-US/wpid/2843/cid/2/cdid/9767/readonly/0/pbmode/edit/h/b25e039cd98cce8e4570796058550011ab41b8d385e513af4d63de619dca3a2a/-/newsletter-signup?uh=50fbd1504933db2c269427872e788efc928a3e0d1d8279d73636f1b2781b400f)** where we share the latest things people are talking about in the community.

you sharing something about [Kentico on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/kenticosoftware/posts/?feedView=all)? Unsure how to tag your post for maximum reach? 1. **@Kentico** somewhere in your post to make sure we get notified. 2. Use hashtags **#Kentico** or **#XperienceByKentico** to talk about us as a company or Xperience by Kentico as a product. 3. Don't be shy using **#DXP**, **#CMS**, **#DigitalMarketing**, or **#DigitalExperience** hash tags to reach a non-Kentico audience.
